1.title: Intro
1.plot: An introduction to what 'The Magic Of' is all about.

2.title: AGE vs MIND
2.plot: Age. Most people think once they're old, their life is over. Younger people are spoken of as being stupid and immature. Is it really like that? Or is it mind over matter? What makes an age, and why is it so important to society? Let's talk about it...

3.title: Anxiety
3.plot: Anxiety. Lots of people suffer from it, especially friend and fellow actress Ashley Gray. Together, we talk about anxiety and what helps us relieve it, and our viewpoints on different things related to anxiety. Join us!

4.title: Anger
4.plot: Anger. Why do we let it control so much of ourselves? When something angers us, what should we do about it instead of letting it 'eat us alive'? Is there anything positive about anger? A positive way to channel and deal with it? How does it relate to our happiness, and when we accidentally put the key to our happiness in someone/thing's pocket? Let's chat about it!

5.title: Honesty
5.plot: Honesty. What does it mean to people these days? To us, it's valued. Is there such thing as being too honest? Where's the line between honesty and being mean or rude? Should you give people your truth ALL the time? Let's chat about it.

6.title: Coexisting
6.plot: Why can't we all just get along? On this episode, we discuss coexisting. It doesn't matter what religion you are, the core foundation and belief of each is to love and respect all. Why can't we TRULY do that more often?

7.title: Filmmaking
7.plot: Hollywood. Hollyweird. The film industry. Entertainment industry. Are you an aspiring actor or actress? Well... we'll tell you what no one else will. Some have, but people don't seem to appreciate behind the scenes truths that much - surprise. Some true stories of woe, terror, and absolute disgust. Don't be discouraged, but do be informed. Knowledge is power!

8.title: Self Injury, Part 1
8.plot: Self Injury. It's a hard topic for most to discuss, and a triggering one for some. April Washko, a recovered self harmer, grabs her lifelong friend Candiss McInerney to discuss it in a fresh, positive way. What can you learn from it? What helped them? A two part discussion on this topic.

9.title: Self Injury, Part 2
9.plot: The part two of a discussion about a difficult topic, Self Injury. If you or someone you know is struggling with self harm, April and Candiss are here to let you know that if they made it... so can you. Find happiness. Look in the mirror and tell yourself you're amazing, and that you love you. Become your best friend, and know you deserve to be in this world. You're amazing, and you can survive, thrive, and find love for your life too.

10.title: Surrender
10.plot: Let it go. Seriously. Do you know that holding on to events or toxic feelings or anything negative inside your emotional cavity or your mind will do nothing but create toxic things inside and outside your body/life? Yeah. Crazy isn't it. It's not worth it. If it's stressing you out, give it up. Surrender it.

11.title: Kiddos
11.plot: There are countless quotes and pieces of wisdom related to children. Their souls and hearts are so pure, and full of good. It's said that if an adult feels lost, troubled or 'out of touch' to spend an hour with a child. I believe that to be true. So, in this episode, I grab my friend's kiddos to join me for some laughs and relaxation. Join us!

12.title: Friendship
12.plot: It's FFFRRRIIIEEENNNDDSSSHHIIIPP! There's so many ways to break down what friendship is. From person to person, it can certainly differ. What do we think makes friendship strong? What makes a friend? What tears friendships apart? Most importantly, what does friendship mean to YOU?

13.title: Powers Beyond Us
13.plot: Do you believe there are powers beyond us? People we look to when things go wrong? People, beings, energy that controls things like 'fate' and 'coincidence'? Do you call it a name, like God, or is it just a force? The Universe? Energy? I grab my lovely friend Candiss to chat with me on what she thinks about this. What do YOU think?

14.title: Living vs Goals
14.plot: Are you living, truly - fully - completely living, or are you just breathing while you chase goals? Really. Evaluate that. Sit and think. Are you? Are you making each moment, regardless how small, the fullest and most abundant it can be... or, not?

15.title: You're a Prophet!!! (Seriously)
15.plot: Thoughts create things. You know that, right? Of course you do. You know that what you focus on grows. You know all about affirmations and 'I Am' statements and how the Law of Attraction works, right? It's all those little things you use (usually without knowing it) that literally build your life.

16.title: Obstacles (pt 1)
16.plot: Obstacles. Something so many people hear and think 'NOOO!' Really, it's all about how you think of them. The way you perceive. Your perception. I grab my girl Krysten, who I've known for over 10 years now to discuss them with me. Obstacles are nothing, really. We promise. Just a little hill to climb. Who doesn't love a little challenge anyways? We do! Part one of a two part episode!

17.title: Obstacles (pt 2)
17.plot: Welcome back! This is the second part of our two part discussion on Obstacles. Really, they're nothing to even blink about. Life gives us everything for a reason, we know this. Everything is to help us grow and show us the best way to our goals. Learn, grow, climb, and just have fun!

22.title: HISTORY vs DESTINY
22.plot: April Washko takes you through her dark past including childhood abuse, drug addiction and suicide attempt in an effort to explain how she survived.

23.title: PAST LIVES! I Remember Mine... Do You?

24.title: You Only See What You WANT to See (with a Real Psychic Medium!)
24.plot: Professional psychic medium Wendy Piepenburg sits down and chats about many things. One of which how people only see what they want to see.

imdb.plot outline: Life doesn't happen to you, it happens for you. Regardless what events unfold in your life - good, bad, indifferent - there is always magic in them. You are the alchemist of your own life. Thought by thought, choice by choice, you build your reality. In this series, we explore the magic of... you. The universe. Emotions. Quotes. Living your best and greatest life, and so much more.
imdb.title: The Magic Of
plot: Life doesn't happen to you, it happens for you. Regardless what events unfold in your life - good, bad, indifferent - there is always magic in them. You are the alchemist of your own life. Thought by thought, choice by choice, you build your reality. In this series, we explore the magic of... you. The universe. Emotions. _Quotes_ (qv). Living your best and greatest life, and so much more.::April Washko
